== Pappinisseri (CT) (627228) ==

Pappinisseri (CT) is a town in the [[Kannur]] taluka of [[Kannur]] district with an area of 15.22 sq. km. and harbouring 7225 households with total population of 35134 as per the 2011 Census. The district headquarter [[Kannur]] is at a distance of 12 km. The state headquarter [[Thiruvananthapuram]] is at a distance of 527 km. Male population is 15988 and female population is 19146. Scheduled Caste population is 3025 and Scheduled Tribes population is 68. Census Location Code of the town is 627228<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

Population wise class of the town is Class III (population_total 20,000 to 49,999).
The civic status of the town is 'Census Town'.

The nearest city with population more than 1 lakh is Kanhangad  (m + og) at a distance of 55 km. The nearest city with population more than 5 lakh is Kozhikode (m corp. + og) at a distance of 102 km. Railway station is at Pappinisseri at a distance of 0 km.
